mapper.update: UPDATE finmate.post SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, last_updated = NOW(), is_anonymous = #{anonymous}, status = #{status.code}, category_tag = #{categoryTag.code}, product_tag = #{productTag.code} WHERE post_id = #{postId}
mapper.select: SELECT post_id, board_id, member_id, title, content, created_at, last_updated, hot_board_time, is_anonymous, like_count, comment_count, status, category_tag, product_tag FROM finmate.post ORDER BY created_at DESC
